IONIAN SEA.
ITALY.
DNC 09.
17 METER F/V NUOVA ANGELA SECONDO,
WHITE AND BLUE HULL, THREE PERSONS ON BOARD,
UNREPORTED. LAST KNOWN POSITION
IN AREA WITHIN TEN MILES OF PORTO CESAREO
(40-16.00N 017-54.00E) AT 071300Z JUL.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A
SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC ROME,
